contentfulProjectEntry.title: All 500 ration packs Disbursed and Drive Completed

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Alhamdolillah all 500 ration packs are disbursed. Some of the last few recipients were 17 labourers. 32 packs were provided to reverts.

Labourers in Mithi benefiting form ration drive

We held back images showing faces of those recieving the donations to help preseve their dignity. I thank my well-wishers for their genuine support and understanding.

May Allah be pleased with us all, and allow us to do more to reduce the sufferings.

Below is a message from Mufti sahab (our lead) who conducted the ground work - which is the most difficult phase of any initiative. May Allah bless him and his family.

الحمداللّٰہ بھت چھان بین کے بعد جو سب سے زیادہ اس وقت متاثرین تھے انکو بغیر دھکم دھکا اور رش کے، عزت کے ساتھ انکے گاؤں میں سیاسی اور وڈیروں کی سفارشات سے پاک اور احسن انداز سے پہچانے کی کوشش کی گئی جس میں اللّٰہ پاک نے آپ حضرات کے اخلاص اور دعا کی برکت سے کامیاب فرمایا

Alhamdolillah all 500 ration packs are disbursed. Some of the last few recipients were 17 labourers. 32 packs were provided to reverts.

We held back images showing faces of those recieving the donations to help preseve their dignity. I thank my well-wishers for their genuine support and understanding.

May Allah be pleased with us all, and allow us to do more to reduce the sufferings.

Below is a message from Mufti sahab (our lead) who conducted the ground work - which is the most difficult phase of any initiative. May Allah bless him and his family
